overview: The story of a woman in her 40s who is jumping back into the dating pool and looking for love. It's hard when you've passed that magical 'Life Begins at 40' mark and you've decided that it's time to find your person. Dating is hard enough for Millennials and Gen Zs, but for the more 'mature' among us - good luck! Add in the extra layer of being a lesbian, and the dating 'pool' shrinks to more of a puddle! Follow Lex's adventures as she stumbles, falls, picks herself up - and does it all again - in her quest to find her One.Â
title: Love Me Lex
